summary: adds custom ai for expanding the size of khajiit caravan
descriptionHtml:
adds custom ai for expanding the size of khajiit caravan.

i love all the khajiit npcs but dont really care for the locations they were found so this master file adds custom Ai to each member of the khajiit caravan so if you use one of the ai packages i added on one of your npcs they will become part of that caravan and actually travel with them

when making the npcs with this mod add the custom ai you want mark them as part of that caravan and then place the npc in the world and once the world loads that npc will spawn alongside the caravan you made them part of and will actually follow ithem.

good for khajiit children or adding new guards or followers or trainers to each caravan.

there will be patches for some custom npcs here  that will use this mod like the khajiit children mods and even a couple khajiit npcs of course youll need those mods before the patch is installed.

feel free to use this just dont upload it yourself cause that is theft.


so far these mods are ones i have made patches for feel free to suggest khajiit mods to add patches to the list or even make your own using the framwork AI package i added

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59028/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D59028%26preview%3D&pUp=1]V[size=2]imune - Kitten Khajiit Companion and Adorable Daughter - Utilizes Child Voice[/size] by [b]Mojiro-Glas[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25654/?]K[size=2]hajiitChild Maisha[/size] by [b]tktk[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44818/?][size=2]Siamese Female Khajiit Follower - Meeran the Black-Hearted[/size] by [b]Fiszi[/b][/url]


[b][/b]please let me know of any bugs 

also for best use make sure the caravans you make your npcs are placed near the one they follow. for instance Ahkari is in Dawnstar os if using her ai package place you npc in dawnstar as well
author: Elfendrago87
